Reviews.Title: “No frills sleep”
Reviews.Author: Miramaks
Reviews.Content: booked room asked nonsmoking gave smoking smelly room overlooking busy street late booking believe nonsmoking rooms booked hotel seems busy priceline booking poor location self park public lot distant rooms elevator room bad shape cigarette table stained chairs bathroom bad shape cracked tile cracked sink someone class action hotels provide three four star class advertised priceline priceline parking free

Reviews.Title: “better than expected”
Reviews.Author: fussweh
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights miyako couple weeks ago enjoyed things considered compared minus restaurants stay westin late june little tokyo definitely japanese feel dont understand surprises people room average comfortable efficient friendly staff made stay good one would stay

Reviews.Title: “Good value hotel away from the centre of the city”
Reviews.Author: majikthise
Reviews.Content: got room expedia asked non smoking room arrived nonsmoking rooms available except visited smoking room smoking floor didnt make 2 steps room smell take vegas level stench never encountered worse smell would couldnt stay hotel would cancel reservation refund money expedia made good deal room stayed days inn cheaper bigger room great bathroom free breakfast friendly helpful people 400 day parking

Reviews.Title: “Average, not 4 stars”
Reviews.Author: Marducita
Reviews.Content: really small room panel floor broken glass accross wardrobe doors yet clean order bathroom large set bath windows cant left small opening hence problems fresh air room free wifi quite slow black spots small selection food breakfast positive good communication due vicinity sants station easy walk montjuic big asset mobile world nice simple public areas especially restaurants helpful friendly staff bottom line good overnight sleep busy visit barcelona romantic weekend would select something closer la rambla

Reviews.Title: “Not 4* star standard!”
Reviews.Author: kirstenrd
Reviews.Content: great location arriving main rail station sants 5 mins easy walk across main entrance avenida easy access underground parts city requested quiet internal courtyard room room adequate 2 people fine nice modern decor comfortable bed free wifi also bedrooms local bars eating places within minutes walk hotel also nice breakfast room lounge area though take breakfast staff reception really helpful local tips dealing travel companions delayed arrival holding luggage late departure negative found bathroom bit small big guy though fittings good quality worked fine

Reviews.Title: “Barcelona-pickpockets”
Reviews.Author: Bradders2175
Reviews.Content: hotel located 5 minute walk sants railway station catch metro city centre room small simple clean bed quite firm prefer rooms corridors wooden floors reviewers commented terribly well soundproofed noise corridor could problem aircon also quite noisy high setting recommend setting low want sleep well bring ear plugs room back hotel experience problem noise outside wifi free worked perfectly fine room first floor 65 euros per night including breakfast think good value barcelona despite railway station nearby many eating options close hotel eat centre coming back hotel

Reviews.Title: “WELL LOCATED”
Reviews.Author: vicramasinger
Reviews.Content: stayed place long weekend friends enjoyed didnt breakfast rather outside one bistros well located near station get anywhere barcelona within reasonable time means rooms nice huge ok plan stay something sleeping however get hear someone walks hallway loud neighbouring rooms tiny

Reviews.Title: “Whatever you do at this hotel, don't have the breakfast. Poor value.”
Reviews.Author: CinzanoSuffolk
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 hotels europe far worst paper thin walls horrible bed bad customer service internet working entire stay got 2 hours sleep vacation star motel 4 star hotel

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: NicRich
Reviews.Content: wanting getaway low budget managed absolutely excellent time hotel great one mini complaint room put originally air conditioning didnt work told staff fact excellent moved us immediately room fully working aircon fuss room small clean bathroom newly refurbished nice luxurious hotel quite far main sites making walk never sants station 5mins walk hotel using get tourist zone far preferred way getting hotel provide breakfast either full buffet simple breakfast cost reduced amount could simple breakfast fruit juice coffee pastry next station one breakfasts ever totally recommend sum hotel lovely staff great want higher class hotel without price match definately want action isnt place

Reviews.Title: “Not Thrilled”
Reviews.Author: Angelfish'sMom
Reviews.Content: firstly hotel excellent location close sants train metro station reached airport 25 minutes booked stay 2 nights 3rd night free deal excellent value planning using wi fi service think costs 9 euros 1 hour 15 euros 24 hours much better option use internet cafe around corner carrer de cheap 1 euro per hour also close excellent place buy breakfast decent selection small sandwiches croissants cakes etc excellent coffee fresh orange juice typical breakfast small ham cheese glass freshly squeezed orange coffee cake would cost around 5 euros big saving 12 euro hotel breakfast barcelona excellent city short break obvious sights well worth visit intend visit olympic stadium free enter olympic museum worth look 3 euros wouldnt bother cable car ride castle top hill short ride doesnt offer great views expensive better take time walk thats option simply take taxi metro station visit sagrada familia gaudis cathedral make sure take lift ride top tower costs 250 euros must one last thing big cities watch pockets bags time advice would leave wallet hotel take whatever cash need day metro pick pockets tourists talking english guy metro robbed whilst talking neither us saw thing seem groups metro busiest hope review helps
